website_summaries.verdict: It doesn't bring anything new to the table, but the new 2DS XL delivers a fantastic Nintendo portable gaming experience at a great price.
pros: The New Nintendo 2DS XL is basically a 3DS XL, minus the 3D, with a slightly improved design
It gives you access to a huge library of great games, including past DS, NES and SNES classics
cons: The tiny stylus is very awkward to use
There's little new here for anyone who already has a 3DS in their bag

customer_reviews.title: Nintendo does it again
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to the DS line. Lighter and slightly smaller than the 3DSXL, but with almost the same screen and quality. The only thing you miss out on is the 3D portion, which wasn't all that great anyway,. The benefit of this new one is the fact that it will play the new SNES game from the e-Ship (Virtual Console) Same Nintendo quality, very reasonable price - especially with the latest price drop. Plays all DS and 3DS game and has access to the eShop. Can't go wrong with this thing
customer_reviews.author: MSA

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to say except that - I LOVE THIS THING!!! <3
customer_reviews.text: Oh boy do I love this. I had a brick 2DS, and 3 new 2/3DS XL exclusive games (didn't understand when I bought them). The exclusive games are great, especially Xenoblade and Minecraft, even if you never intend to get the exclusive games, get this. Just as sturdy as the brick 2DS, but with much larger screens, useful extra buttons, and more that just make this a beautiful and sturdy machine. The increased processing power will also eliminate lag you'd get playing certain games (like Pokemon Sun/Moon) on the original 2DS. So unless you LOVE 3D, this is the handheld device to get.
customer_reviews.author: Morgulon

customer_reviews.title: Beware the screen, it's very delicate
customer_reviews.text: Works great and stays charged for a pretty long time. Beware the screen though as it is very easy to crack. I was simply applying screen protector and the top right corner cracked/shattered, ironic right? Luckily it was just a small area that was damaged, so I won't complain much, but be careful when applying any amount of pressure to the edges of the top screen.
customer_reviews.author: Kankuro

customer_reviews.title: The scratched screen was the cheery on top
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely dissapointed on the condition this 2ds was in for $135. It had scratches not just on the back and front which didn't matter to me it was just the really large scratch on the top screen that lead me to no longer want it. Tbh i was expecting more since it's Amazon. With $30 more it's just worth it to get the discusting purple 2ds from targets or best buy for $165 i guess (੭;' ꒫`)੭. Giving one star is too generous but it's mandatory.
customer_reviews.author: Giorno Giovanna

customer_reviews.title: Great system!
customer_reviews.text: I am not big on mobile gaming, but it is nice to be able to play old gameboy games on a modern system--oh the nostalgia! This system has a huge screen, and is able to play ALL 3DS games without the annoying 3D feature. The design has definitely been improved since it's predecessor, the original 2DS. All in all, I love this little system!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!!! Find a different vendor
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these for the nephews, unfortunately I wasn’t able to order both from the same vendor. This one stopped working, this is unbelievable. For the amount of money spent it only worked for a couple of works. My nephew is of course upset.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fully functional
customer_reviews.text: The 2Ds arrived fully functional with just a few very minor scratches on the lid, which is fine considering I bought used. Packaging was some what in shambles but everything was there and in working order. I did wish it came in the original box but, again, it was bought used so no real complaints. Just letting it be known incase other buyers are looking to collect the original box with their system.
customer_reviews.author: Ramses Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Dang this gets broken easily
customer_reviews.text: We have so far loved the system and games but the screen has broken twice with what seemed like pretty mimimal trauma. We even had screen protectors and a case. Definitely don’t get this for a child under 20 and buy the protection plan.
customer_reviews.author: Abi

customer_reviews.title: For 2D its a great portable console
customer_reviews.text: For 2D its a great portable console. Screen quality is as good as it gets on a D XL. Feels light and great when holding the 2D XL. Though it feels cheaply made, it feels sturdy and maybe can take a few falls. If you dont want 3D this is a great Hand Held!
customer_reviews.author: blkhawk666

customer_reviews.title: Good console, annoying vibration with sound
customer_reviews.text: Excellent console, and if you are comparing this to the 3DS XL, you do save a considerable amount of money. There are some things to consider: most noticable is the speaker placement, which makes the console vibrate. The stylus is also shorter than old 3DS XLs, and the cartridge placement is a pain to open. Great screens and good buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher D.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Screens
customer_reviews.text: It's light, fast, and the buttons have great touch feedback. The large screens make playing games much more enjoyable than my 3DS (non-XL). And for the price, amazing! I never used the 3D function anyway, so this was a perfect buy. The one thing that I don't like is that it only has a microSD slot, so I can't use the large SD card I already bought.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Feels great, good battery life
customer_reviews.text: Once I saw this announced I knew I needed to upgrade from my old original 3DS to a bigger screen. I felt no need of the 3D capabilities and when Nintendo announced this new system I had to go with this updated 2DS XL option. Feels great, good battery life, plays all the games I have.
customer_reviews.author: A.Z.

customer_reviews.title: Devices not from US. Nintendo will not help with repairs.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 6months of receiving it. Nintendo support won’t help because this company sends devices that are not from the US. The serial # is from another region and the only support Nintendo will offer is to exchange it for a fee of over $50.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Ethridge

customer_reviews.title: Nicely Packaged!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas and he loved it. It came safely packed too!!
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Great build quality
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? I love it. Great build quality. Plays most of DS games, except those that utilized the GBA slot in some way, and all 3DS games. The lack of 3D can be an issue with some games that make heavy use of it, but if you are like me and 3D made your eyes hurt and gave you headache then you would have had it turned off on the 3DS either way. Before getting this I had a DS Lite, I pretty much would have skipped on the 3DS if it weren’t for the new 2DS XL. Great product, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amani

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: My old 3ds broke so I got this because I didn’t use the 3d feature that much. The system to system transfer was quick and it works great. The only bad thing I noticed is that the cameras are even worse than before. They have a dark look woth a blue hue to it.
customer_reviews.author: The Paulson’s

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like? A 3DS without the gimmiky 3D and for a much better price. Nintendo hit it out of the park with this.
customer_reviews.author: rwasham

customer_reviews.title: This 2DS XL is great because it has all the features of the New ...
customer_reviews.text: Who needs 3D view. I had the 3DS XL and never used the 3D view and when I did I noticed I had to view a certain way and if I moved I lost the effect. This 2DS XL is great because it has all the features of the New 3DS XL minus the 3D view. Just wish it had bluetooth so I could connect wireless headset.
customer_reviews.author: forcie270

customer_reviews.title: Strait Whoop
customer_reviews.text: DS brings everyone together, never had one before so this was my first. So glad I purchased because I work with kids and they have these so I can play with them and strait whoop them in smash brothers!! I'll probably whoop you too reading this. So buy a psp loser, you don't want none!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon H.R

customer_reviews.title: Says new but it's used or poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Works, in package like it's new but the screen wobbles like it's just refurbished or something, not very good quality
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Strange but good
customer_reviews.text: It’s so thin and the screen is pretty big. I got it as a gift but did a test run with it to make sure it worked (it does) but it’s a bit strange how thin it is cause I’m so used to the old clunky ds.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much everything it’s perfect 💯💯💯💯🙌🏼 I love my new 2DS Xl
customer_reviews.author: Cairony Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Solid system.
customer_reviews.text: Power button is a bit wonky (on all of these, not just my specific one) Display is huge. Make sure you pull off clear plastic protection from screen. Thought my DS was malfunctioning until I realized the cover was messing with controls. Good system.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Devogel

customer_reviews.title: Great system.
customer_reviews.text: Love the screen sizes and it’s super quick from the start.
customer_reviews.author: D Villalobos

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value. I have no need for a 3D screen, so I can have this one for much cheaper. It's just like a 3DS without the 3D feature. At first I thought 2DS meant that it was an older or knockoff version. The XL screen is nice, I wouldn't want it to be any smaller.
customer_reviews.author: AvidOnlineShopperTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: It's an amazing unit, best color combination out of any DS imo
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: 6 months later and my son still plays this DS everyday. We got it, because he wanted a device that could play the figures that you can buy and sync to the system. Works like a charm. Plays all FS games, regardless of whether it is for DS or DS 2 or 3. I’m impressed with how well the unit has held up to the abuse of our household.
customer_reviews.author: Ncmomma123

customer_reviews.title: Bigger screen is nice
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this product 5 stars except for two things. First, it's really hard to turn on & off. A couple of times I thought it was off but it wasn't & the battery drained. Second, the black stylus is super easy to lose. A bright color would be way better. I ended up having to buy another stylus.
customer_reviews.author: emg

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase..
customer_reviews.text: I disliked the fact that it worked on and sometimes shutting off..So frustrating to try and enjoy this 2ds. I finally told my mother and she is very upset and will not order from Amazon any more. I will also relay this to all my friends who are on Amazon..
customer_reviews.author: Anthony ONeill

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My kid loved this! It is a great gaming system and has improved in look and quality since the original DS system. I would recommend anyone who gets it to get a screen cover to because you use a stylus a lot and I could see how with time it might get scratched up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: RIP to the greatest handheld ever!
customer_reviews.text: Rest in peace the DS systems. Unless they make another one down the line for some reason. Btw it's great if you want a 3DS but don't want the actual 3D with it. So far has played all my 3DS games just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: The Ultimate DS Experience
customer_reviews.text: All the fun of the 3DS games with none of the nauseating eye soreness of the 3D screen. Holds a charge well, quality construction and button response. Good for adult hands or 8 year olds. A great investment for gaming!
customer_reviews.author: Mom Fears My Music

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Got it today i loved it!!! I also bought a tempered glass screen for the system to protect it totally worth it. The system is super light compare it to the new 3ds xl. The top screen feels wobbly but im an adult i can take care of it.
customer_reviews.author: Thinh Q. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Tons of games available
customer_reviews.text: This has been the perfect combination of price and game titles available. I take my 2DS everywhere I go.
customer_reviews.author: Devin V.

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2
customer_reviews.text: This worked fine for my grandson for 1 yr then it wouldn't turn on after it was fully charged. I bought 2 and the other one works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Book

customer_reviews.title: Endless, mindless, entertainment that will turn your child into a zombie
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it, but the screen protectors somehow prevented the touch screen from working so now he is using it without the screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Jschwartzott

customer_reviews.title: No stylus? :(
customer_reviews.text: Not the best look to it when it arrived. A little scratched and not very clean. But I knew when I bought this that not all used products look brand new. The only real qualm I have is it didn’t come with a stylus even though it advertised as the whole package :( so now I have to buy my own. But overall I guess it’s okay for used and I mean you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Its SUPER GOOD and a great console, but about the microSD.
customer_reviews.text: Its a great console, and has great games. one of the best Nintendo handhelds ever! But when I got this, it had no microSd. I couldn't use themes, save game files, couldn't update games I need to update, and most importantly...I COULDN'T PLAY 2 GAMES THAT I ALWAYS WANTED TO PLAY. I really need a response to the people that sold me this, But again, great console!
customer_reviews.author: JULIO👨‍✈️💫

customer_reviews.title: FAKE
customer_reviews.text: Fake. Stickers matching the color of the box were covering “UAE, Saudi Arabia, Malaysia, Singapore official product”. I called Nintendo to verify the ID number and it did not register. If you see something similar, report the seller. The system feels cheap overall, and the top screen is low quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Nintendo
customer_reviews.text: I love the new Nintendo but when I put a game of Tetris in it thing Mario cart titeris I don’t care for that don’t like Mario nothing was said that it was a Mario Nintendo.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the bigger screen. It’s faster, is more compact, better graphics. You won’t be disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: The design has completely changed and no longer is there a reason for that old bulky 2ds. The screen is beautiful and the design is super sleek. My favorite handheld at the moment!

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: always wanted one since i was a little kid! works like a dream and i couldnt be happier with the nintendo! only one tiniest problem, the upper screen wobbles front and back after first opening, dont know if i opened it wrong or the production went a millimeter off. but otherwise PERFECT!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great option, but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love the new slightly smaller and lighter build Aestethics are awesome as well And I love that it has Amiibo NFC and backwards compatability with DS games A few things that I wished would change would have been the speaker direction location and the placement of the stylus.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Criteria need to be tightened for categories.
customer_reviews.text: Listed as very good. No stylus, scratches, and pictures aren't "very good" condition. Not pleased.

customer_reviews.text: purchased it January 2018 it's now 11 months later and the screen went black with minimal play about once a week. Its adult owned and I only used it for occasional Mario paper. It was fun while it lasted.

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought the product used and it had a bad shoulder button. Contacted the seller and he swoped it out right away with a working model (I think it's a brand new one) overall very happy with product and customer service. I would buy from this seller again.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love it I just wish I could play my gba games on it too (:

customer_reviews.title: Smaller, cheaper but still just as good
customer_reviews.text: Lacks the 3D function of the larger 3DS xl but overall does exactly the same thing in a smaller package and cost less. Downsides it doesn't feel as solidly built as the standard 3DS XL and the stylus is tiny. Overall a good buy if you don't care for the 3D function
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: The better overall design more than makes up for the lack ...
customer_reviews.text: Having played on a 3DS and 3DS-XL prior to this, I honestly think the 2DS-XL is an upgrade in EVERY regard. The better overall design more than makes up for the lack of 3D which honestly stayed off 90% of the time anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Stytches

customer_reviews.title: Nice 3DS system
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to play all the new digital games coming out for the New 3DS. I love it! I would recommend this handheld for anyone trying to play digital copies of older games.
customer_reviews.author: zerof1703

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: The handheld itself feels real flimsy but, that might just be how they are. Aside from that it works exactly as described. Good Product
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Aguayo

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: It's a solid handheld, and I'm loving it! A bit of a software issue at first, but was quickly resolved by telling the issue to the seller. Besides the small smudges and very small line on the dark end of the screen, the 2DS XL plays very well and it's a solid device. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Needed for an Alaskan trip, kept me entertained, looks extremely good, feels great. Highly recommend for anyone

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to the 3DS if you don't care for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to the 3DS if you don't care for the 3D feature. It certainly feels more durable than many other systems in the 3DS family. The only problem is that the power button is a little hard to press.

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Gift for grandson, he likes it much better than the first one, bigger screen much easier to see

customer_reviews.title: Item damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product delivered fast but volume buttons didn't work and the ds itself was scratched. Someone definitely used it quite a bit before me

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy I could finally get my hands on one of these.
customer_reviews.text: My very first "Gameboy" after a very long time. I must say I feel so bad on missing out on the DS and the 3DS, time to make up for lost time.

customer_reviews.title: #1 handheld console ever and best model of all the 3DS/2DS series.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Awesome console. #1 handheld console ever (Not comparing it with the Switch obviously, that is another thing) Best model of all the 3DS/2DS series. Excellent value.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved his Christmas gift. He will hardly lay it down.

customer_reviews.text: I bought this over a year ago and it still works great. I had the 3DS XL before I gave it to a family member because I wasn't using the 3D function since it hurts my eyes. I bought this 2DS XL and it makes me wish I had bought this one in the first place.

customer_reviews.title: Great system.
customer_reviews.text: Great console, light weight and easier to carry around than a 3ds. Over pretty great.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: unit arrived in good condition, no paperwork in the unsealed box
customer_reviews.text: unit arrived in good condition, no paperwork in the unsealed box, this was supposed to be new, but was covered in fingerprints, when I turned it on I found some ones profile signed into the unit. so now I have a handheld that I not only need to figure out how to factory reset, but I have access to to this guys account....
customer_reviews.author: Kheldon

customer_reviews.title: Love It! Though it does have one downside.
customer_reviews.text: This product is a very good portable gaming system, I bought it around Christmas last year (2017), and with the few games I own, I have a TON of fun with it. Worth the $150. The only downside is: The games are a little pricey, some games from 2012 still cost around $30-$50.

customer_reviews.text: The New Nintendo 2DS XL is the perfect system for those uninterested in 3D. Sporting everything that the New 3DS XL has (of course lacking in the 3D feature) with a matte finish and superb design, this system is bound to make you happy.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Gaming System
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Nintendo New 2DS XL for my 11 year old's birthday this year. He is definitely satisfied with the portable gaming system.

customer_reviews.title: Box looked opened when I got it. Charger was ...
customer_reviews.text: Box looked opened when I got it. Charger was loose and finger prints on the screen. Didn't think much on it at first, then I tried to turn it on. It did not turn on. Tried to charge it and power it on again after an hour. Still nothing. Returning it and buying from someone else.

customer_reviews.title: Came new, looks great
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a DS in forever and bought this wanting to play animal crossing again. It plays wonderfully and is nice without the 3ds feature

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my son. From what I can see he LOVES it!

customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and works well, the only issue is some serious lag when i play certain games.

customer_reviews.text: Everything works great but you can’t connect to public WiFi without accepting the terms of service. And it doesn’t let you.

customer_reviews.text: This was such a good buy! If you’re looking to get into 3ds games this is the best way to start! Pick one up brotha

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Seller
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit worried about ordering a used product, but I am super impressed by the quality. I ordered a 2DS XL and I can't even tell it's been used. I would definitely buy from this seller again!

customer_reviews.title: Best handheld to date
customer_reviews.text: Best handheld to date. Awesome library. Personaly, I tried the 3D on a N3DS and it makes me feel dizzy in seconds (even tho I don't suffer from stuff like motion sickness, or eye strin while playing); so having a 2D only, pocket version of the new hardware for a lower price is just great

customer_reviews.title: Screen visibility issues
customer_reviews.text: The screen is going out and its been less than a year when I purchased it. You should offer warranty guarantee for any kind of kids electronics, not just on select models. Especially for Amazon Prime members, such as myself.

customer_reviews.title: comfortable to hold
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek handheld, comfortable to hold, nice design. Battery life is disappointingly short.

customer_reviews.title: Best buy...
customer_reviews.text: My kids are very happy with the 2DS XL, All of there games downloaded. And it works great. Thx

customer_reviews.title: Missing micros SD and stylus
customer_reviews.text: The item had a clean screen, and I was fine with the scuffs, but the missing stylus and micro SD card made it actually impossible to let me play Pokemon Y, making this product essentially useless. Better to just buy it new.
customer_reviews.author: Roscoe

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great upgrade from my previous 2DS. Large screen and quality case. Best way to play 3DS games while saving some cash not paying for a nauseating 3D feature.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and a great price! I have a very happy 12 year old!

customer_reviews.title: Broken stylus holder
customer_reviews.text: The items arrived in a timely manner. I just gifted this to my girlfriend, however we were disappointed to find that the holder for the stylus is broken. For a product labels Used-Very Good, I would not expect not pay for so

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very good. Top screen wobbles a little but it sits upright. Seller says it doesn’t come with a charger, but it does and it used the same charger as the dsi, 3ds and ds.
customer_reviews.author: Suke

customer_reviews.title: It is broken...does not work properly
customer_reviews.text: Is there any kind of a warranty?. Had the Nintendo 2XL for less than 5 months and there is a diagonal line across the top screen. You only see the left half of the game or frame. The Nintendo worked fine up until about a week ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome system, and you save a lot of money just buying this instead of a new 3ds!
customer_reviews.author: R White

customer_reviews.title: The service was good. I am happy.
customer_reviews.text: Thank you. The 2ds XL work's very good. I like it. I got it on time. I am very happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Burkett

customer_reviews.title: A great product...
customer_reviews.text: I have been very pleased with this product. It is user friendly. There are some games I can’t get on it I wish I could but other than that it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna

customer_reviews.title: Packaging
customer_reviews.text: The DS came to you with no box or original paperwork, so we sent it back. Just wasnt what we were expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Cleary

product_meta.title: Nintendo New 2DS XL - Black + Turquoise
product_meta.description: Edition:Black + Turquoise"Gamers of all ages can play in style with the New Nintendo 2DS XL system. It gives you the power of the New Nintendo 3DS XL system in a streamlined, affordable package-and plays a huge library of games in 2D. Colorful accents add style, while the sleek clamshell design makes it comfortable to hold and helps to keep screens safe from scratches when closed. A fast processor offers short loading times, so you can start playing in a snap. And it's all in a lightweight, play-anywhere package. The C Stick brings enhanced controls (like intuitive camera control) to compatible games, while ZL and ZR buttons give you plenty of options. Tap an amiibo figure to the near-field communication (NFC) reader on the lower screen to enjoy amiibo features in compatible games. You can play all Nintendo 3DS, New Nintendo 3DS and most Nintendo DS games in 2D on this system. Compared to Nintendo 2DS systems
feature_bullets: Colorful accents add style, while the sleek clamshell design makes it comfortable to hold and helps to keep screens safe from scratches when closed
A fast processor offers short loading times, so you can start playing in a snap; And it's all in a lightweight, play anywhere package
The C Stick brings enhanced controls (like intuitive camera control) to compatible games, while ZL and ZR buttons give you plenty of options
Tap an amiibo figure to the near field communication (NFC) reader on the lower screen to enjoy amiibo features in compatible games
WHO CAN WEAR THESE? Anyone, These shoes are loved by all; They are suitable for boys, girls, men, women, professionals, and particularly youth in search of a fashion shoe
